text: viddhut unakee aankhon ko uchak lene ke sameep ho jaatee hai. jab unake lie chamakatee hai, to usake ujaale mein chalane lagate hain aur jab andhera ho jaata hai, to khade ho jaate hain aur yadi allaah chaahe, to unake kaanon ko bahara aur unakee aankhon ka andha kar de. nishchay allaah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai
